#labels com,vba,vbs,netcombridge
=== Show the current date in a message box ===

 {{{
 Sub Test_DateTime()
     Dim lBridge As New NetComBridgeLib.NetComBridge
     MsgBox lBridge.Type("System.DateTime").Property("Now").Get().Method("ToString").Invoke1("yyyy MM dd")
 End Sub
 }}}

=== Use a .NET form object ===
 {{{
Sub Test_MessageBox
    Dim lBridge As New NetComBridgeLib.NetComBridge
    lBridge.LoadAssembly "System.Windows.Forms", "2.0.0.0", "neutral", "b77a5c561934e089"
    lBridge.Type("System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox").Method("Show").Invoke3 _
        "My message", _
        "My title", _
        lBridge.Type("System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons").Field("YesNo")
End Sub
 }}}
